title: Hayley Tamaddon shares first picture and name of 'miracle newborn son' two weeks after birth
text:

Hayley Tamaddon has shared the first picture of her newborn son and revealed his adorable name.

The snap, which looks like it was taken hours after Hayley, 42, gave birth, shows her son skin to skin swaddled in a blanket.

She captioned the black and white snap: "Two weeks ago and a little earlier than expected, I gave birth to our beautiful baby boy.. we have called him... JASPER.

"It’s been a whirlwind!! The most incredible life changing experience.. it’s beyond anything I’ve ever felt.. it’s a love so strong and overwhelming... I just cry when I look at him! I feel truly blessed that he’s mine."

(Image: hayleysoraya/Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She continued: "Thank you for all your wonderful messages - and for a lot of you - going on this journey with me, and letting me share my stories and pictures with you all. There’s going to be a few more on here soon!

"I also want to thank the most amazing midwives and doctors at Saint Mary’s hospital that took care of us both so well.. what amazing, hard working people.

"Welcome to the world Jasper...Your mummy and daddy love you so very much. And I can’t wait to see what the universe has in store for you. I’ll be right there by your side, every step of the way."

(Image: hayleysoraya/Instagram)

(Image: hayleysoraya/Instagram)

Hayley thought she would never be a mum.

She first thought she might have problems with her fertility while she was in a relationship with comedian Marcus Brigstocke.

Hayley assumed she'd naturally fall pregnant but began having tests towards the end of their relationship.

After they broke up she gave up hope as she was 40 and single, saying: "I thought 'well, it's never going to happen now'."

(Image: Andy Barnes / BACKGRID)

"I threw myself into my career and turned my focus to work and was happy."

She'd had trouble with her ovaries since she was a teenager, and had been plagued by ovarian cysts throughout her adult lfie.

Her mum had similar problems conceiving, revealing it had taken her parents seven years before she arrived.

When she started dating her fiancé Adrian she told him she might not be able to have children.

(Image: Instagram)

They had discussed adoption as Adrian really wanted to be a dad.

They were devastated when they suffered a miscarriage in January.

But it wouldn't be long until she conceived again, she admits she took 18 tests to be sure.

Hayley told Closer magazine: "I must have taken 18 tests - 10 after my first one and then one each day throughout the week.

(Image: Instagram)

"I spent a fortune, we couldn't believe it."

She announced the pregnancy in April, posting: "EXCITING NEWS TWEET!! I'm so pleased to tell you all... I'm expecting my first child with my wonderful boyfriend Adrian!!

"I've always wanted to be a mum and didn't think I could have children."
description: The former Emmerdale actress was told she would never conceive naturally
